div.p:
Sheet B which I
return today must be
perfect except two
words in page 12.
I was the Skipper
I keep one copy of
6th Revise for reference.

A doubt has arisen
in my mind whether
I pointed out in
page 35a that the two
lines at the beginning
of the chapter should
be transferred to
middle of 28th line of
page 35a - the lines
begin with "The steamer
returned from the bar &c.

Again page 54 which I
enclose corrected lies on
my mind.

Again on page 50
I think the name of the
stream is wrong & I
leave it out but insert
in the slip two and the a date
and place filed by
astronomical observation.

I send appendix
that it may be seen
what is the Archbishop's
and what is mine
& quotation marks
put in where
needed.

The corrections or
additions sent
I think have been
put in very
nicely. I should
like Owen to see
about the elephants
between pages 70 & 80
I think.

I have recievedreceived
pages 83 & 89 & will
soon have them
ready.
